GSD.description:
ceph: fix inode reference leakage in ceph_get_snapdir()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit b2d9bb3f06abddefdfa740b0a604575b6797e1bf. For more details please see the references link.
